title: Advanced Human Life Detection
description: Built a prototype to detect vital signs under debris using multi-sensor fusion, signal processing, and ML.

title: Gesture Detection with OpenCV
description: Real-time hand-gesture recognition using OpenCV achieving ~85% accuracy under variable lighting conditions.

title: Gesture-Control Contactless Switch
description: Arduino-based contactless switch using APDS-9960 sensor to toggle appliances without touch.

title: Electronic Voting Machine (MPLAB)
description: Prototype EVM using PIC16F877A with button interfaces and buzzer feedback.
